name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Travian Mark as Read at Top

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension creates a button at the top of the reports page to mark them as read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to create a button to mark reports as read at the top of the page (Travian)
